My First Blog

Your Name on 8 December 2025

Use Markdown to write your blog posts. You can use various Markdown styles to style your posts, including:

Heading levels

Start with Headig level 3 as Heading Level 1 is used by the site title and Heading Level 2 is used by the post title. You donâ€™t need to add the post title to this file the Markdown file title will be used e.g. My Frst Blog.

Bullet lists

You can create bullet lists to show information more clearly:

  • Bullet 1
  • Bullet 2
  • Bullet 3

You can also use numbered lists:

  1. Item 1
  2. Item 2
  3. Item 3

Code

You can use one backtick to write inline code and three backticks to create code blocks:

1+1
